description: Anastasia Shevchenko has been under house arrest for a year and has found a spy-camera in her flat.
title: Russian bedroom camera in aircon 'spied on activist'
title_page: Russian bedroom camera in aircon 'spied on activist' - BBC News
maintext: "Now you always think, maybe there's a camera there," she explained. "They managed to install it last time, so who knows? How can we be sure?"
